def run_DTPM_framework.sed_inplace (   filename,
  pattern,
  repl 
)

DTPM framework script.

This script runs the entire DTPM framework Author: asart.nosp@m.or@c.nosp@m.mu.ed.nosp@m.u 

Perform the pure-Python equivalent of in-place `sed` substitution: e.g.,
`sed -i -e 's/'${pattern}'/'${repl}' "${filename}"`.
